LanguageData.CE_AmmoContainer_DropAmmoDesc: Drop whatever this ammo container's contents onto the floor.
LanguageData.CE_AmmoContainer_ForceReloadDesc: Reload adjacent turrets immediately. Forbidden turrets and currently firing turrets will be ignored.
LanguageData.CE_AmmoContainer_NoTurretToReload: {0} cannot find any adjacent available {1} turrets.
LanguageData.CE_AmmoContainer_ToggleReplaceDesc: Choose wether or not the ammo container should replace turret's current ammo with the ammotype in the container.
LanguageData.CE_AmmoContainerBusy: Ammo container is reloading or being reloaded.
